name: Holy Survival
description:
FINAL BUILD for MAGD 272 SPRING 2022. 

[fixed version -  (hopefully) fixed UI scaling issues]

[MAC VERSION - there is a slight scaling issue with the main menu, otherwise everything else seems to be running fine.]

CONTROLS (just in case you somehow miss them in-game): 

WASD to move, E to repair/interact, SHIFT to sprint, TAB to swap weapons, LEFT CLICK to attack/shoot, ESC to open the pause menu. You can use the bright blue doors to teleport once per wave, interact with them by using E.
